description.narrative: Gestion administrative et programmatique du Sous-Bureau de Maroua, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Development effectiveness evidence and rights-based, results oriented country programme in line with national, regional and global strategies and priorities, and in development and emergency contexts.

mailing-address.narrative: Winston Churchill Avenue P.O. Box 1181 Yaoundé

sector.narrative: HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
